content.body: If you want to track Checkbox' state in your component's state.
By doing so, you can make the Checkbox a controlled component, which means that its checked state is determined by the state of your component.

To make a checkbox component a controlled component, you'll want to create a state property that represents its checked state. You can then pass this value as the checked prop to your checkbox component.
